entry.title: Jane's Resume
entry.content:
Borned in 1992, graduated in Harbin University, lifelong learner.

Family member

  • ddog data analysist
  • mobao pretty poodle

Self Evaluation

  1. Experienced in coordinating sales and production, have a good understanding of data analysis, be able to use programming language(Python, SQL) to process data, have a certain level of understanding of Tableau, Power BI;
  2. Experienced in project planning and good at communication & cooperation;
  3. Lifelong learner;
  4. Worked at Top 500 foreign company, fluent in reading and writing in English, can use English as working language;
  5. Settled in Nanjing, appreciate the culture of Ericsson, looking forward to join this organization.

Work Experience

Sep. 2020 – Feb. 2022 Shuangxie Auto Supplies Co., LTD Order Management

  1. Coordinated sales and production, reviewed & processed orders
  2. Analyzed products sold to customers, provided business advises to sales team
  3. Trained newly recruited customer service staff
  4. Advertised the new products on the social media
  5. Other tasks assigned by GM

May. 2017 – Jan. 2019 Harbin Lizhilianhe Consulting Co. LTD Headhunting

  1. Provided headhunting consultant service to customers, helped customers find & select candidates
  2. Performed candidates reference check, salary negotiation, etc.
  3. Maintained customer relations, as well as finding new customers

Dec. 2015 – Apr. 2017 Master Kong Shanghai HR Specialist

  1. Planned & implemented the human resource development plan, reserve of talents program as well as other HR related plan for the company
  2. Established and enforced the communication between universities and the company, built a good connection for the company
  3. Managed the career change of employees, such as promotion, etc.

2013/06 – 2015/12 Yum! Harbin HR Specialist

  1. Participated the Yum! “Campus ambassador competition” in third year of university, won the competition and honored with being an intern of Yum!
  2. Became a full member as HR recruiting specialist after graduate from the university, conducted campus recruitment，be responsible for the recruitment of management team of KFC, Pizza hut as well as other brand owned by Yum!

Hobbies

Reading / Exercising / Pets
